DOC.brief_summary: Patients schedule elective PCI randomize pitavastatin 4mg daily without pitavastatin 5 -7days procedure . Creatine kinase-MB , troponin I , myoglobin level measure baseline 8 24 hour procedure ( 1st evaluation ) . After PCI , pitavastatin administer additional 4 week ( 2nd evaluation ) .
DOC.brief_title: Pitavastatin Pre-Treatment Study Patient With Elective PCI Stable Angina Pectoris ( PIPA )
DOC.detailed_description: Procedural ischemic myocardial injury remain frequent complication coronary angioplasty . Recently report pretreatment atorvastatin reduce myocardial damage compare placebo . Thus , evaluate difference pretreatment pitavastatin compare standard therapy reduction myocardial damage patient schedule elective PCI stable angina pectoris .
DOC.criteria: Patients LDL ≥ 100mg/dL Patients schedule elective PCI stable angina Acute myocardial infarction ( < 3 month ) Unstable angina Previous treatment statin ( < 6 month ) Increase CKMB upper normal limit Increase liver enzyme ( AST/ALT ) 2 time upper normal limit Increase serum creatinine 2 time upper normal limit Left ventricular ejection fraction < 30 % Previous treatment glycoprotein Ⅱb/Ⅲa receptor inhibitor ( < 4 week )
